text: All spaces on any duly recorded plat of land thereon designated as streets, avenues, or alleys shall thereupon become public ways, provided they are made in conformity with § 1-1313.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-914.

1973 Ed., § 1-614.

DC CODE § 1-1314

Current through December 11, 2012
